The statement ‘There is nothing more Ame.Quote: The statement ‘There is nothing more American than an Indian’ happens to be a multidimensional paradox. Try and not say too many of those. That might open your mind to ideas that could cause sanity point loss.
The statement ‘There is nothing more Ame.Author: Charles Slagle

Hey, I am thinking of it myself, in this.Quote: Hey, I am thinking of it myself, in this part of world (East), we all do endeavors in praying and are sweating (white liquid) and this is our situation, frustrated , but on the other part of world (West) ,they are enjoying in party and drinking liquor (white liquid) but their situation is that, successful, I do not know that the problem relates to the type of liquid or the way of drinking!!
Hey, I am thinking of it myself, in this.Author: Ali Shariati

You've gotta dance like there's nobody w.Quote: You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching,Love like you'll never be hurt,Sing like there's nobody listening,And live like it's heaven on earth.
You've gotta dance like there's nobody w.Author: William W. Purkey

A room without books is like a body with.Quote: A room without books is like a body without a soul.
A room without books is like a body with.Author: Marcus Tullius Cicero
